content:
Sure, here are some suggestions:

1. Mizuno Okonomiyaki
2. Chibo
3. Kiji
4. Okonomiyaki Kiji
5. Fukutaro
6. Ajinoya
7. Okonomiyaki Chitose
8. Issen Yoshoku
9. Tsutenkaku Tower
10. Fukushima Okonomiyaki

All of these restaurants serve delicious Kansai-style Okonomiyaki and are highly recommended by locals and tourists alike. Enjoy your dining experience!
